# BookmarkFile.get_icon method

```csharp
public static bool get_icon(IntPtr bookmark, string uri, out IntPtr href, out IntPtr mime_type, 
    out IntPtr error)
```

| parameter | description |

| uri | Transfer ownership: none |
| href | Transfer ownership: full |

| error | Pointer to an error or IntPtr.Zero |
